Name: Sergeant WhiskerByte
Description: A battle-hardened veteran from the digital front lines, Sergeant WhiskerByte was once the purr-fect guardian of cyberspace. With a body of sleek black and the heart of a feline, he prowled the web, defending against cyber threats with unmatched agility and precision. His screen, which once displayed the most confidential of intel, now bears the scars of a skirmish that went awry, a web of cracks marking the site where he took a devastating hit. Despite the damage, his spirit remains unbroken, and the T&T5 badge on his side serves as a constant reminder of his resilience and dedication to the WebtrES club.
